text: Married At First Sight is an international reality television franchise. It originated in Denmark and has versions in Australia, America and Britain. The show is a social experiment where strangers are matched by dating experts and "marry" each other. At the end of each series, each couple decides if they want to stay together. The show, especially the Australian version, is known for its heated confrontations and controversial contestants. Category:Television series about marriage Category:Reality television series
title: Married At First Sight
